newsitem.title: USA: Potash Corp of Saskatchewan issues debt. [CORRECTED 22:15 GMT]
newsitem.headline: Potash Corp of Saskatchewan issues debt. [CORRECTED 22:15 GMT]

text.p: The following debt offering from Potash Corp of Saskatchewan Inc was priced on Wednesday via lead underwriter Smith Barney, dealers said.
Potash Corp is a Canadian company based in Saskatoon and is in the integrated fertilizer business.
Co-managers on the offering were Donaldson Lufkin & Jenrette Securities, JP Morgan Securities and Merrill Lynch & Co.
TYPE NOTES ISS PRICE 99.332 FIRST PAY DATE
LAST MOODY'S BAA2 YIELD 7.22 PAY FREQ SEMI
S&P BBB SPREAD 67 BPS CALLABLE NO CALL
(Corrects S&P rating from BBB-minus to BBB)
